r.s: Savvy is a powerful but lightweight object-oriented template system for PHP.
r.d: Unlike other template systems, Savvy by default does not compile your templates into PHP; instead, it uses PHP itself as its template language so you don't need to learn a new markup system.
r.n:
Port PEAR2_Templates_Savant to Savvy.
* Always throw exceptions. * Never load files internally.
Package Savvy API release notes for version 0.1.0.
